K01upsmpjnu:462: maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ ākāśānantyāyatanasya vijñānānantyāyatanasyākiñcanyāyatanasya
K01upsmpjnu:464: ṛddhiviṣayasya divyaśrotrasya cetaḥparyāyasya pūrvanivāsasya cyutyupapādasya āsravakṣayasya (Upj(J)
K01upsmpjnu:465: 24.20-25; ~ Skt.C 52 v4-53 r1; vgl. Kṣudr-v(Bhī) 27 a3-b1; ŚrBh(T: re-ed) I 214.8-12)
K01upsmpjnu:467: anarhann eva sann arhann aham asmy aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyīty ātmānaṃ pratijānīte 'nyatrābhimānād ity (Upj(J)
K01upsmpjnu:470: evaṃrūpaṃ bhikṣuḥ sthānam adhyāpadya sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣur bhavaty aśramaṇo 'śākyaputrīyo
K01upsmpjnu:471: dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvād dhatam asya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ mathitaṃ patitaṃ parājitam
K01upsmpjnu:475: tadyathā tālo mastakāc chinnaḥ abhavyo haritatvāya abhavyo virūḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatām āpattuṃ (Upj(J)
K01upsmpjnu:478: evam eva bhikṣur evaṃrūpaṃ sthānam adhyāpadya yāvad apratyuddhāryam asya bhavati
K01upsmpjnu:483: kaccid evaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ nādhyāpatsyase tena vaktavyaṃ nādhyāpatsye (Upj(J)
K01upsmpjnu:486: tataḥ paścāc catvāraḥ śramaṇakarakā dharmā ārocayitavyāḥ evañ ca punar ārocayitavyāḥ
K01upsmpjnu:487: śṛṇu tvam āyuṣmaṃś catvāra ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
K01upsmpjnu:488: evaṃ pravrajitopasaṃpannasya bhikṣoḥ śramaṇakarakā dharmā ākhyātāḥ katame catvāraḥ (Upj(J)
K01upsmpjnu:491: adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmann ākruṣṭena na pratyākroṣitavyaṃ roṣitena na pratiroṣayitavyaṃ
K01upsmpjnu:492: tāḍitena na pratitāḍayitavyaṃ bhaṇḍitena na pratibhaṇḍayitavyaṃ kaccid evaṃrūpaṃ
K01upsmpjnu:496: śṛṇu tvam āyuṣman yas te 'bhūt pūrvam āśāsakaḥ kaccid ahaṃ labheya svākhyāte dharmavinaye
K01upsmpjnu:497: pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ sa tvam etarhi pravrajita upasaṃpannaḥ pratirūpeṇopādhyāyena
K01upsmpjnu:498: pratirūpābhyām ācāryābhyāṃ samagreṇa saṃghena jñapticaturthena karmaṇā akopyenāsthāpanārheṇa (Upj(J)
K01upsmpjnu:501: yatra varṣaśatopasaṃpannena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ tatra tadaha upasaṃpannena
K01upsmpjnu:502: yatra tadaha upasaṃpannena tatra varṣaśatopasaṃpannena iti yātra samānaśīlatā samānaśikṣatā
K01upsmpjnu:506: adyāgreṇa te upādhyāyasyāntike pitṛsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā upādhyāyenāpi tavāntike putrasaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā /
K01upsmpjnu:507: adyāgreṇa te upādhyāyo yāvajjīvam upasthātavyaḥ upādhyāyenāpi tvaṃ glānaḥ upasthātavyaḥ āmaraṇāya vāvyutthānāya vā (Upj(J)
K01upsmpjnu:508: 26.1-4; ~ Skt.C 53 v6-54 r1; vgl. Kṣudr-v(Bhī) 31 b3-5)
K01upsmpjnu:510: adyāgreṇa te sagauraveṇa vihartavyaṃ sapratīśena sabhayavaśavartinā sabrahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu /
K01upsmpjnu:511: (Upj(J) 26.4-6; ~ Skt.C 54 r1-2; vgl. Kṣudr-v(Bhī) 31 b5-(32 a1))
K01upsmpjnu:513: adyāgreṇa te uddeṣṭavyaṃ paṭhitavyaṃ svādhyāyitavyaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalam*
K01upsmpjnu:514: dhurā ca te na nikṣeptavyā aprāptasya prāptaye anadhigatasyādhigamāya asākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai (Upj(J) 26.7-10; ~ Skt.C 54 r2-4)
K01upsmpjnu:516: imāni ca te mayā audārikaudārikāṇi śikṣāpadāny ākhyātāni anyāni cānvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśa
K01upsmpjnu:517: uddiśyamāne śroṣyasi anyāni ca te ācāryopādhyāyā grāhayiṣyanti samānopādhyāyaḥ samānācāryaḥ
K01upsmpjnu:518: ālaptakās saṃlaptakāḥ saṃstutakāḥ sapremakāḥ (Upj(J) 26.11-14; ~ Skt.C 54 r4-7)
K01upsmpjnu:524: eṣa tvam āyuṣman upasaṃpanno 'pramādena saṃpādaya (Upj(J) 26.15- 27.3; ~ Skt.C 54 r7-v2)
